```rust,editable
fn main() {
    let thousand_digits = "";
    let zero = '0' as u64;
    let digits = thousand_digits
        .chars()
        .map(|c| c as u64 - zero)
        .collect::<Vec<u64>>();
    let mut max = 0u64;
    for i in 0..digits.len() - 13 {
        let tmp = digits[i..i + 13].iter().product();
        max = std::cmp::max(max, tmp);
    }

    println!("{}", max);
    assert_eq!(max, 23514624000);
}
```
